title: When your trying to get to gold before the end of the season.
body:
At first you're like.
http://www.the-arcade.ie/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/lets-do-this-ucas-gif.gif

After a while you're like.
https://media1.giphy.com/media/3o6MbfCRLGdhIVZ1NS/200w.gif

And you at last pick yourself back up for one last desperate attempt.
http://i.imgur.com/nXJbkqY.gif?noredirect

replies.body: This has pretty much been the summation of my push for gold. Like every season. Q.Q

Finally got to my promos for gold and I'm currently 2-0.

Senpai pls make sure they don't flip the switch on my account ;_;

You people are pathetic. Suspending someone from the boards for criticizing your godawful matchmaking.

Since when is "c-u-n-t" homophobic, racist, or sexist?

Get your panties untwisted and grow a thicker skin, you're grown adults.
No U.
pls

You're part of Riot, right? Don't they pay you in RP cards and free skins?

Kappa.
i actually want challenger now cuz of the "physical goods" maybe next year
Don't forget the word ''*Exclusive* Physical Goods''  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Starting from B1 and it only took one game to remember why I stopped playing ranked after placements...but I must carry on! For skins!
I began in Bronze II, so I feel ya.
I was a B2er too, then I took a demotion to the knee.

Everyone wants gold and I'm sitting here like
https://giphy.com/gifs/silver-the-hedgehog-sonic-06-wes0M1yQt2nmg
I got to B1, but then a Disco Nunu to the knee, and then an "I can't play mid give me jungle or ill AFK" to the other. Gotta love bronze
hehe, I just want gold because the leader of the Runeterran Brigade decides to go gold, and I can't let her beat me when I was a higher rank. Now I failed.
https://m.popkey.co/d1d31d/5eQeA_s-200x150.gif
i went from b3 to g5. silver 3 was by far the hardest.
It really is. The last two seasons I've started Bronze 1-2 because of bad placements l, but quickly rose to Silver after a few wins. Then the real hell began.
carried myself from bronze 4 to gold 5 solo with orianna. if i can do it, anyone can.

and then you see maokai is getting victorious skin.
http://i.amz.mshcdn.com/o7XdoVTX7A3biNlSrI-Fw4ajNUM=/fit-in/1200x9600/http%3A%2F%2Fmashable.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2012%2F08%2Fsleep.gif
#notworth
Totally worth it if you ask me
BTW, How long do we have to the end of the season?
I would wager you wanna be done before mid November my friend.

Holy shit. I was expecting mid/late December.

Gotta start to spam games on the weekends now.
Weekends are the worst time, since you have more people who are likely to simply troll due to free time.

I've found the best time is around 2-3am. If your playing games at 2-3 in the morning there is a good chance you give a shit about the game, therefore less asshats who are trying to ruin other peoples days. Yeah there are still asshats, you will never get away from an asshat in this game, but there are fewer

I found that if you play at 8 am to 2 pm you'll be away from the kiddies that don't know how to play and only get on to use the big bad curse words Mommy and Daddy use. I literally played from 8, got to my promos, and at 4 pm all the kids are on and ruin my promos. It was a very literal difference in players that is was obvious. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Yeah it usually ends like a couple weeks to a month after worlds ends.
It ends at the midnight of novemeber 7th as in november 8th 1201 am
November 7th to be exact

Started at Bronze 3 this season.  Made to Gold 5 and thought about making a run for Plat but after a 3 game losing streak at 0 LP I decided to stop chancing fate and be happy with what I had accomplished.  Plat can wait until the off season and Diamond is the goal for season 7.

WTF. EXACTLY.FUCKING.SAME.

STARTED bronze 3, hit gold 5. got 32 lp, then lost 3 games in a row and got 0 lp. Now i dont wana risk it.

Plat next season amirite.
As long as you reached that, you will be fine. For rewards only the higher rank achieved matter. So feel free to play ranked without anxiety.

IIRC you can't actually be demoted from Gold V to silver I unless you lose so much your MMR hits silver V, so you should be fine to keep going without risking getting demoted for just a couple losses.

Considering he cme from bronze to Gold his mmr is lower than his rank so it is some where in sliver the hed have to play games and stay in gold for a while with constant games to get a higher mmr than his rank. now unless of course he spent along time in silver 1 or 2 then his mmr could be gold 5 or higher despite his rank

Normally the result of climbing fast is an exceptionally high mmr, it should at least be gold v mmr.

If he hardgrinded like u say his mmr should be about gold v still, but neither higher or lower in most cases.

Hmm thats the opposite of what i was told before i was told if you were sitting at a standard mmr and then raised ranks quickly then you would have to play more games in (enter division here) for your mmr to catch up hence why your lp gains drop as you climb rank until you have been in that divsion a while.
It made since to me at that time but im no expert on it I just heard i that before.
thanks then.

You're safe. Keep trying.

Trust. Been there, done all of that.

Good to know. Thanks for the advice. Now I just gotta get motivated to climb again. I feel like I both enjoy and learn so much more from normals games. Plus my normal games usually have plat/diamond players in them which is always a plus.
Good luck, mate!

I'm living proof that you can do it! I'm actually in my promos for Gold IV now, so the progress is still ticking away. Keep looking for ways to improve yourself and never stop learning.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

GL m8, i lost mine.

At least I got a free win for the next G4 promo, so that helps.
Yep, but be ready once you get here, it's a complete and utter shit show where nobody but you knows what the fuck they're doing.
Girlfriend climbed from B5 to S5 as a Sona support main. If she can do it, you guys can do it too.
Ive been stuck in silver 2 for months.
Add me. I'll give you a free tutoring session. ^_^
WMNA THIS ISN'T THE FIRST TIME YOU'VE USED "YOUR"!! GAHHH! I'M A TRIGGERED GRAMMAR NATZEE!!!
I finally broke gold the other night. Anivia flew me so high.
At the moment is it  even possible to climb from Bronze II to Gold V in just a little over a month?
It is possible but people focus on one team winning but usually fail to realize that in their winning they are also pushing 5 other people down the ladder.
yes.
